releaseNotes:
Stay connected to the Olympic Games with the latest news, sports updates, and live event streaming—all in a brand-new experience!

We’ve completely redesigned the app to make it faster, smoother, and more intuitive. We value your feedback and are always working to improve your Olympic journey.

What’s new:

- A new vertical video player to watch all your favourite moments
- Introducing search functionality to quickly find content
- Performance improvements for a better experience

Enjoy the update, and let us know what you think: support.olympics.com
description:
Follow the Olympic journey with the Olympics app. Go behind the curtain with exclusive coverage of your favourite sports, athletes and events. Stay up-to-date with original series, breaking news, podcasts, and live streams of Olympic qualifying events. Your personal companion to the Olympic and Paralympic Games awaits.

With the Olympics app, you can: 

• GET EXCLUSIVE ACCESS: discover in-depth insights into Olympic events, breaking news, and watch live sports.
• WATCH OLYMPIC QUALIFIERS: don’t miss any action, see events live from the app! 
• CUSTOMISE YOUR EXPERIENCE: add all your favourite Olympic events, teams and athletes for insider access straight from the source. 

Whether you’re keeping up with the Qualifiers, interested in the stories behind events like the Torch Relay and ceremonies, or simply want to learn more about the Olympic Games – the Olympics app is the perfect companion. 

SCHEDULES & RESULTS 

Stay on top of all the Olympic events. Our handy reminders help you know when the events that you are interested in are taking place. 

OLYMPIC QUALIFIERS

Watch the Olympic Qualifiers live, straight from the app. From skateboarding to freestyle skiing and gymnastics, there are plenty of new and exciting events to see. Follow your favourite athletes or discover emerging talents!

MINUTE-BY-MINUTE UPDATES 

It’s hard to stay on top of everything that’s going on at the Olympics! The Olympics app allows you to stay updated with minute-by-minute news on all your favourite events. 

CUSTOMISED MESSAGING

Create a customised experience by adding all your favourite Olympic events, teams and athletes. That way, you can enjoy content and updates that cater to your Olympic interests. 

PODCASTS & NEWS 

Listen to curated Olympic podcasts that inspire and motivate the athlete in all of us. You’ll find the most in-depth sports coverage right here on the app, as well as an exclusive look behind the scenes. 

—------------------------------ 

The app content is available in English, Japanese, Chinese, French, Hindi, Korean, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian and Spanish. Please refer to our terms and condition and privacy policy for additional terms.
